total_subquestions_ys: Q1: Identify the cells in the grid that are surrounded by the same number on all four sides.
Q2: Replace the identified cells with the number that surrounds them.
Q3: Identify the cells that are surrounded by the same number on three sides and a different number on one side.
Q4: Replace the identified cells with the number that surrounds them on three sides.
Q5: Identify the cells that are surrounded by the same number on two sides and different numbers on the other two sides.
Q6: Replace the identified cells with the number that surrounds them on two sides.
Q7: Identify the cells that are surrounded by the same number on one side and different numbers on the other three sides.
Q8: Replace the identified cells with the number that surrounds them on one side.
Q1: Identify the cells in the grid that are surrounded by the same number on all four sides.
Q2: Determine the number that surrounds the identified cells.
Q3: Replace the identified cells with the number that is one greater than the surrounding number.
Q4: Repeat the process for all cells in the grid.
